# Trigonometric Functions
The definition of the trigonometric functions explained via the unit circle.

![Trigonometric Functions](mathematical-foundations/trigonometric-functions.svg)

$$
\begin{gathered}
\overline{CP} = \sin b\\
\overline{SP} = \cos b\\
\overline{DT} = \tan b\\
\overline{EK} = \cot b\\
\overline{OT} = \sec b\\
\overline{OK} = \csc b\\
\end{gathered}
$$
